decks.notes: This UW Control deck aims to outlast opponents with a wide array of control options, including counterspells like Dovin's Veto and board wipes like Supreme Verdict. The deck also includes card draw engines like Omen of the Sea and Memory Deluge to maintain card advantage. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in longer games. The deck's strategy revolves around controlling the board, disrupting opponents' plans, and ultimately overwhelming them with powerful threats like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Fatal Push, Duress, and Thoughtseize. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to pressure the opponent. The deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent, while also keeping their resources in check with removal spells and hand disruption. Additionally, the inclusion of Mutavault and Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber provide additional versatility and resources for the deck to utilize in different situations.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly and aggressively build up a board presence using efficient creatures and removal spells in order to overwhelm the opponent. The deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value and generating card advantage through various card draw and graveyard recursion effects. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Ygra, Eater of All and Cauldron Familiar, along with support from cards like Witch's Oven and Scavenger's Talent, allows for a fast and relentless assault on the opponent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building up its own resources to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on using Spirit creatures to apply pressure on the opponent quickly, with cards like Mausoleum Wanderer and Spell Queller to disrupt their game plan. It utilizes a mix of disruptive spells like Seam Rip and Sheltered by Ghosts to protect its creatures and maintain control of the board. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and steady stream of Spirit creatures while controlling the battlefield with counterspells and removal spells. The deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure throughout the game to secure victory against slower or less aggressive opponents.

This deck focuses on building a strong board presence quickly to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. Utilizing a mix of legendary and non-legendary creatures, the deck aims to control the battlefield and deal damage efficiently. The inclusion of mana acceleration cards like Mox Amber allows for explosive starts, while cards like Relic of Legends provide additional benefits for your creatures. With a strong synergy between its creature lineup and land base, this deck aims to outpace and outpower opponents in a fast-paced match.

This deck focuses on casting spells quickly and efficiently to get multiple Arclight Phoenixes into play as soon as possible, overwhelming the opponent with powerful flying creatures. With a heavy focus on card draw, removal spells, and cheap spells to trigger the Phoenix's ability, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain a strong presence on the battlefield. Temporal Trespass provides a game-ending finisher, while cards like Artist's Talent and Picklock Prankster help filter through the deck for key pieces.

The main idea of this deck is to use aggressive Rakdos creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and disrupt their game plan. By using hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot while deploying powerful threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also utilizes efficient lands like Mutavault and Blackcleave Cliffs to ensure smooth mana development and maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a combination of efficient creatures and burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The deck aims to establish a board presence early on with creatures like Manifold Mouse and Heartfire Hero, while also utilizing powerful burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to finish off the opponent. Additionally, cards like Reckless Rage and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide removal options to clear the opponent's creatures and maintain control of the battlefield. The inclusion of cards like Hazoret the Fervent and Breeches, Eager Pillager offer additional late-game threats to secure victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to outlast the opponent. It also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils to generate advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds additional synergy to the deck. The main win condition is to control the board, answer threats efficiently, and eventually overwhelm the opponent with card advantage and powerful spells.

This aggressive Red Deck Wins deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. It utilizes a mixture of direct damage spells, powerful creatures, and mana-efficient threats to overwhelm the opponent. Key cards like Hazoret the Fervent and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide consistent damage output, while spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage help control the board and clear the way for attacks. With a solid mana base and a focus on fast-paced aggression, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to mount a defensive strategy.

Utilize Lotus Field and combo pieces to generate massive amounts of mana quickly, allowing you to cast powerful spells like Omniscience and Emergent Ultimatum. Use cards like Hidden Strings and Vizier of Tumbling Sands to untap Lotus Field multiple times in a turn, while protecting your combo with cards like Strict Proctor and Control pieces like Bala Ged Recovery. The goal is to assemble your combo pieces quickly and overwhelm your opponent with powerful spells and game-winning threats.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy that focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while consistently applying pressure with efficient creatures and removal spells. This deck aims to control the board with cards like Abrupt Decay and Fatal Push, while also generating value through cards like Scavenger's Talent and Deadly Dispute. Utilizing strong threats like Ygra, Eater of All and Vinereap Mentor, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly equipping creatures with powerful artifacts like Colossus Hammer to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck includes cards like Sigarda's Aid and Shadowspear to give your creatures an edge in combat, while also including protection cards like Selfless Savior to keep your key creatures safe. The goal of the deck is to overwhelm your opponent with efficient creatures and equipment, using cards like Raubahn, Bull of Ala Mhigo and Kellan, the Fae-Blooded to close out the game quickly.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Knight-Errant of Eos and Venerated Loxodon, supported by removal spells like Gleeful Demolition. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures while also maintaining card advantage with cards like Thraben Inspector and Novice Inspector. The mana base is optimized for consistent early plays and utilizes powerful lands like Sacred Foundry and Shefet Dunes to maximize damage output. The deck's strategy revolves around efficient creatures, removal, and aggressive combat tactics to secure victory.

The deck is focused on disrupting the opponent's hand and board with cards like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Liliana of the Veil while also controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gifted Aetherborn to apply pressure. The deck's win condition is to outvalue the opponent with card advantage and strong creatures, ultimately overwhelming them with a mix of disruption and threats.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Warden of the Inner Sky, Knight-Errant of Eos, and Venerated Loxodon to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. With cards like Cosmogrand Zenith and Gleeful Demolition for removal and disruption, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption. The inclusion of cards like Novice Inspector and Thraben Inspector provide card advantage and potential early game presence. This deck aims to outpace the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize.
